price: ߞߎߟߎ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߋ ߟߋ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߊ߲ߣߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ ߞߊ߲߬ ߦߏ߫ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߍ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
